mapper.insert: insert into user_cart (cart_userid, cart_productid, cart_count, cart_id) values (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{cartCount}, #{cartId})
mapper.select: select DISTINCT cart_id as cartId, cart_userid as cartuserId, cart_count as cartCount, product_id as productId, product_name as productName, product_price as productPrice, product_delivery_price as productDeliveryPrice, product_model as productModel, product_maker as productMaker, product_preview as productPreview, product_category as productCategory from user_cart join product_detail on (cart_productid = product_id) where cart_userid = #{userId}
